column4: Microsoft introduces HoloLens to businesses through Dynamics 365 apps
column5: Microsoft Corp announced on Tuesday new AI and mixed-reality applications for its Dynamics 365 online business software  putting to use its augmented-reality goggles HoloLens for businesses.
